original_text: I would like to tell you many more things. But I do not want to write them in a letter.
korean_text: 내가 네게 쓸 것이 많으나 먹과 붓으로 쓰기를 원하지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: I would like to tell you many more things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신에게 더 많은 것을 말하고 싶습니다

sentences.original_text: But I do not want to write them in a letter
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 그것들을 편지에 쓰고 싶지 않습니다
